params:
{
  "viz_type" : "pie",
  "groupby" : [ "super_user_name" ],
  "metric" : {
    "aggregate" : "AVG",
    "column" : {
      "column_name" : "reels_count"
    },
    "label" : "AVG(reels_count)",
    "expressionType" : "SIMPLE"
  },
  "adhoc_filters" : [ {
    "comparator" : "Last year",
    "operator" : "TEMPORAL_RANGE",
    "expressionType" : "SIMPLE",
    "subject" : "upsert_date",
    "clause" : "WHERE"
  }, {
    "comparator" : "%{chat_id}",
    "clause" : "WHERE",
    "subject" : "chat_id",
    "operatorId" : "EQUALS",
    "expressionType" : "SIMPLE",
    "operator" : "=="
  } ],
  "row_limit" : 100,
  "sort_by_metric" : true,
  "color_scheme" : "supersetColors",
  "show_legend" : true,
  "legendType" : "scroll",
  "legendOrientation" : "top",
  "label_type" : "key_value",
  "number_format" : "SMART_NUMBER",
  "date_format" : "smart_date",
  "show_labels" : true,
  "labels_outside" : true,
  "label_line" : true,
  "show_labels_threshold" : 5,
  "show_total" : true,
  "donut" : true,
  "outerRadius" : 70,
  "innerRadius" : 30,
  "extra_form_data" : { }
}
description: Average reels per day grouped by sender
